clinical_age_month.Description: age at the time of testing, in months

fMRI.Description: yes if valid fMRI data, otherwise no

group_detail.Description:
finer clinical diagnosis at the time of assessment;
    'CTL' = Cognitively Normal Control, 'SCD' = subjective cognitive disorder,
    'SCD+' = ???, 'lMCI'= l?? mild cognitive impairment,
    'eMCI' = ? mild cognitive impairment

site.Description:
site of data acquisition;
    'IGM' = Institut universitaire en geriatrie de Montreal,
    'CNQ' = Centre de recherche de l'Institut universitaire en sante mentale de Quebec,
    'JGH' = Jewish General Hospital,
    'CHS' = Centre hospitalier universitaire de Sherbrooke
